channel.title: Lostpkz It's back 2012 [Pking/Skilling/Pvm]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll268/sleepy_easy/bannerwiththunder.gif[/img] [size=14pt] Why Join LostPkz?[/SIZE] Tired of all the Overpowered Weapons?We're pleased to present to you one of the best old school pking servers based in 2008. Also, this community isn't planning to shut down, that extra bit of security knowing that you can get home and play a wonderful server should be enough. Our server was quite popular just Youtube "Lostpkz" [size=14pt][/size] [size=14pt][I]
Play Now http://www.mediafire.com/?2eywxhamozyv3v6 Forums www.Lostpkz.org
Vote http://lostpkz.us/index.php?/topic/182-vote-for-lostpkz
Donate http://lostpkz.us/index.php?/topic/29-donation-proof-post-here
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/535/99068205.png/][IMG]http://img535.imageshack.us/img535/2194/99068205.png[/img][/URL]
[/SIZE]
[size=14pt]Media[/size] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xnI9OPDevao http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SY6kdBPohTA
[size=14pt]Staff[/size] [IMG]http://i88.photobucket.com/albums/k170/xXWhiteShadowXx/RL/Forum/Images/Admin.gif[/img]Eman [IMG]http://i88.photobucket.com/albums/k170/xXWhiteShadowXx/RL/Forum/Images/Admin.gif[/img]Mark [IMG]http://i88.photobucket.com/albums/k170/xXWhiteShadowXx/RL/Forum/Images/Admin.gif[/img]Patrick [IMG]http://i88.photobucket.com/albums/k170/xXWhiteShadowXx/RL/Forum/Images/Admin.gif[/img]Alec
[size=14pt]Programmers [/size] [img]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/869/crowns.png[/img]Ron [img]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/869/crowns.png[/img]Marsman
[size=14pt]Features[/size] -The old LostPkz setup. -Active server wide wars -Unique features ONLY found in this original RSPS. - Great Economy - Great combat system - Easy usable teleporting -Perfect revamped skills -Almost perfect animations / stances -Loads of new content for players to enjoy 24/7 up time - great dedicated server -Full slayer tower -Complete old school pking (Pre 2008) -No overpowered custom items, or donation items. -Great pking community - Friendly, nice community and amazing Staff. -With nearly full skills - perfect PvP - various minigames such as the duel arena, 100% warriors guild, 100% pest,100% Barrows - All with the fewest flaws we've ever had.
[size=14pt]Great Pking[/size]
[img]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll268/sleepy_easy/finebanned.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll268/sleepy_easy/lol.gif[/img]
[img]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll268/sleepy_easy/5.gif[/img]
[size=14pt]Good Economy/Community[/size] [img]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll268/sleepy_easy/blows1.jpg[/img]
[size=14pt]Pest Control[/size] [img]http://i35.tinypic.com/2zi3sr9.png[/img]
[size=14pt]Server Wars[/size] [img]http://i278.photobucket.com/albums/kk87/Markftw/lostpkzclanwr.jpg[/img][/center]

@Bl33m wrote:

[center]
[size=14pt]
Why Join LostPkz?[/SIZE]
Tired of all the Overpowered Weapons?We’re pleased to present to you one of the best old school pking servers based in 2008. Also, this community isn’t planning to shut down, that extra bit of security knowing that you can get home and play a wonderful server should be enough. Our server was quite popular just Youtube “Lostpkz”

[size=14pt]Features[/size]
-The old LostPkz setup.
-Active server wide wars
-Unique features ONLY found in this original RSPS.

  • Great Economy
  • Great combat system
  • Easy usable teleporting
    -Perfect revamped skills
    -Almost perfect animations / stances
    -Loads of new content for players to enjoy
    24/7 up time - great dedicated server
    -Full slayer tower
    -Complete old school pking (Pre 2008)
    -No overpowered custom items, or donation items.
    -Great pking community
  • Friendly, nice community and amazing Staff.
    -With nearly full skills - perfect PvP - various minigames such as the duel arena, 100% warriors guild, 100% pest,100% Barrows - All with the fewest flaws we’ve ever had.
